full_text: I didn't remember the Patriots ever being underdogs for their first playoff appearance, so I had a look into #nflverse data. https://t.co/n6z6xNo6IZ

In games that the #Patriots have won this season, they rank 4th in Offensive EPA per Play. 

In games that they've lost, they rank 30th.

What does this mean? The Patriots season could be decided in the first 15 minutes of action tonight.

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/gk8ZAfNJov

Here are the top players in expected points lost to penalties this year.

The Cowboys have FOUR players in the "top" 15 and combined have cost their team around 40 points this season (per #nflverse) https://t.co/9MpWhW573P
